room_title: Escape room "Chapter 2: Playtime" by Lost Games in Las Vegas
room_address: 3075 S Valley View Blvd Las Vegas, NV 89102
room_description: You found the cure in chapter 1. But you’re not out of the asylum yet. The orderlies find you lost in the halls and throw you into the recreational room. With the door locked behind you, it’s playtime. In one hour you’re scheduled for your lobotomy. But you’ve heard whispers of another way out. Can you escape before playtime is over, or will you be lobotomized and lose all sense of self? Move fast.. storm’s coming…
